posts.title: Frans Hals Portraits
posts.body:
Commissioned portraits for Frans Hals Museum Haarlem.

An exhibition with work of 11 dutch impressionists and realists painters (20th century). These portraits were shown next to the paintings on the exhibition Labels. Jacobus van Looy, Coba Ritsema, Herman Kruyder.

gallery.title: Coba Ritsema Herman Kruyder G Pauwels

posts.title: Audiobooks
posts.body: Immerse yourself in audiobooks. For Newspaper RD.

posts.title: Consolation
posts.body: Newspaper Trouw on how to comfort someone when that person has lost someone; be aware not to give well-intentioned advice. And how to just listen and be there for someone.

posts.title: About
posts.body:
Gemma Pauwels is a versatile illustrator specialized in editorial and conceptual illustrations for (online)
magazines and newspapers.

Please feel free to contact Gemma! gemmapauwels@gmail.com

Clients include: Newspaper Trouw, Frans Hals Museum, VluchtelingenWerk, Rabobank,
Publisher Essener, Amsterdam UMC, Theatermaker and more.
